tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
    incident_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    incident_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    resolution TEXT,
    resolved_by VARCHAR(50),
    resolved_date TIMESTAMP,
    vulnerability_detected BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE SecurityIncidents (
  incident_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_description TEXT,
  incident_date TIMESTAMP,
  severity_level INT,
  reported_by VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE IncidentResolutions (
  resolution_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id INT,
  resolution_description TEXT,
  resolved_date TIMESTAMP,
  resolved_by VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES SecurityIncidents(incident_id)
);

CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date TIMESTAMP,
    incident_type VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    severity INT
);

CREATE TABLE resolutions (
    resolution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    resolution_date TIMESTAMP,
    resolution_details TEXT,
    resolution_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    incident_description TEXT,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    severity_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE incident_resolutions (
    resolution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    resolution_date DATE,
    resolution TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (resolution_id, incident_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES security_incidents(incident_id)
);

CREATE TABLE incident_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    analysis_description TEXT,
    analyst_name VARCHAR(50),
    analysis_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES security_incidents(incident_id)
);
